testcase.name: Verify comments - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to BH home page..............................................passed When Click on Find a Center option..........................................passed Then Verify that "/child-care-locator" as a part of its URL.................passed And Search location as "New York"..........................................passed Then verify if a number of found centers is the same as a number of centers displayed in the list.passed Then Click on the first center on the list..................................passed Then Verify whether the center name and the address are the same in the list and in the popup.passed

testcase.name: Verify search functionality - #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given Navigate to BH home page..............................................passed When Click on search icon...................................................passed Then Verify if search field is visible on the page..........................passed And Search for "Employee Education in 2018: Strategies to Watch"............passed Then Verify if the first search result is exact match to what you typed into search "Employee Education in 2018: Strategies to Watch".passed
